full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 467 Filed 11/15/21 Page 24 of 158 24 LBAAMAX1ps Rocchio - Direct 1 I've been doing it for conferences from, you know, 20, 25 years minimally. 2 3 Q. Do you have any other involvement in professional publications? 4 5 A. I, apart from serving on the editorial board for the journal of trauma psychology, not at the moment, no. 6 7 Q. Do you hold -- 8 A. Oh, can I actually correct that answer? 9 Yes. Actually, the other thing is that for the publication I recently had, in addition to submitting articles for peer review, I was an invited guest editor in that particular edition -- special issue of that journal, so that meant that I had to, with my co-editor, solicit articles and then review them for publication. 10 11 12 13 14 15 Q. Do you belong to any professional organizations? 16 A. I do. 17 Q. Do you hold any leadership positions with those organizations? 18 19 A. I do. 20 Q. What are those leadership positions that you hold? 21 A. I'm currently the president-elect for the division of trauma psychology for the American Psychological Association. 22 I am also a member of the ethics committee for the American Psychological Association. I serve as a -- on the executive board of the Rhode Island Psychological Association, where I am 23 24 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00007203
